<<<<<<< HEAD
The Discontented Lady: a new song much in request. To a new tune much in request at court and the play-house.
1 sheet ([1] p.) : music.
Printed for C[harles]. Bates, at the White Hsrt in West-smithfield., [London] : [1690?]
Publisher's name, place and date of publication from Wing. Verse: "How vile are the sordid intreagues of the town ..." Printed in two columns. Reproduction of original in the British Library.
